Document.Name: Search Notice Request root element
Document.Description: The Search Notice Request is a query transaction that requests notices using either a set of criteria for notices usually based on the eTendering Service Providers or Economic Operators ambitions and capabilities.

Attribute.Name: Start Index
Attribute.Description: The Search Notice Request and Response support the ability to iterate over a large result set matching a query by allowing multiple QueryRequest requests to be submitted in succession such that each query requests a different subset of results within the result set. This feature enables the server to handle queries that match a very large result set, in a scalable manner. This attribute is used to indicate which result must be returned as the first result when iterating over a large result set. The default value is 0, which returns the result set starting with index 0 (first result).

Attribute.Name: Maximum Number Of Results
Attribute.Description: This attribute specifies a limit on the maximum number of results the sender wishes the query to return. A receiver of the request MUST return a result set whose size is less than or equal to the maxResults parameter depending upon whether enough results are available starting at startIndex. If the default value -1 is used, the receiver SHOULD return all the results.

Attribute.Name: Search Notice Request Identifier
Attribute.Description: Specifies the unique identifier for an Identifiable Search Notice Request. In case of different start index for same QueryRequest is used it is possible to use the same Search Notice Request Identifier.

Element.Name: SpecificationIdentification
Element.Description: An identification of the specification containing the total set of rules regarding semantic content, cardinalities and business rules to which the data contained in the instance document conforms.

Element.Name: BusinessProcessTypeIdentifier
Element.Description: Identifies the business process context in which the transaction appears. It enables the receiver to process the document in an appropriate way.

Element.Name: IssueDateTime
Element.Description: The issue date and time when the Serch Notice request is issued. The issue date time must have granularity of seconds, and include time zone information.

Element.Name: SenderElectronicAddress
Element.Description: The electronic address of the sender.

Attribute.Name: SchemeIdentifier
Attribute.Description: The type is used to assign the scheme identifier attribute from the list of "PEPPOL Party Identifiers described in the "PEPPOL Policy for using Identifiers"

Element.Name: EndpointId
Element.Description: The endpoint ID of the sender platform

Element.Name: ReceiverElectronicAddress
Element.Description: The electronic address of the receiver.

Attribute.Name: Scheme Identifier
Attribute.Description: The type is used to assign the scheme identifier attribute from the list of "PEPPOL Party Identifiers described in the "PEPPOL Policy for using Identifiers"

Element.Name: EndpointId
Element.Description: The endpoint ID of the receiver platform

Element.Name: Response Option
Element.Description: An element to control the type and structure of results within the corresponding QueryResponse. For the Search Notice Request it is required that the notices are included as repository Items to the QueryResponse. This is indicated through the returnType "LeafClassWithRepositoryItem".

Element.Name: Query
Element.Description: The definition of the query and its parameters. This is indicated through the queryDefinition="SearchNotice".

Element.Name: Keywords
Element.Description: Used to specify searchable keywords and/or synonyms over the entire notice.

Element.Name: FormType
Element.Description: Used to search for specific form types like planning, competition, direct award pre-notification etc.

Element.Name: NoticeType
Element.Description: Used to search for specific notice types (BT-02) [e.g. PIN only] for notice categories [e.g. Prior Information Notice]. A given form type (BT-03) [e.g. Planning] regroups multiple notice types [e.g. PIN only and PIN time limit].

Element.Name: Classification
Element.Description: Used to search upon the values of designated classification systems (BT-26) being either main (BT-262) or additional commodities classifications (BT-263). Currently, only the "CPV" and "SupplementaryCPV" values are considered.

Element.Name: ContractNature
Element.Description: Used to search upon the values of main natures (BT-23) and additional natures (BT-531) of a notice.

Element.Name: PlaceOfPerformance
Element.Description: Used to search upon the values of a country subentity code (BT-5071) according to the Nomenclature of territorial units for statistics (NUTS).

Element.Name: EstimatedValue
Element.Description: An abstract class that defines a container for search attributes related to estimated overall contract amount. Can be used to specify a minimum, maximum, range value or a currency for the procurement. The results correspond to the amounts indicated in the fields Estimated Value (BT-27).

Element.Name: Minimum
Element.Description: Used to search upon minimum contract amount indicated by the Estimated Value (BT-27).

Element.Name: Maximum
Element.Description: Used to search upon maximum contract amount indicated by the Estimated Value (BT-27).

Element.Name: Currency
Element.Description: Used to search upon currencies used to describe the Estimated Value (BT-27)

Attribute.Name: List Identifier
Attribute.Description: The type is used to assign the list identifier attribute.

Element.Name: ProcedureType
Element.Description: Used to search upon type of procurement procedure (BT-105) according to the types given in the procurement Directives.

Attribute.Name: List Identifier
Attribute.Description: The type is used to assign the list identifier attribute.

Element.Name: SubmissionLanguage
Element.Description: Used to search upon the languages that may be used to submit tenders (BT-97).

Element.Name: PublicationDate
Element.Description: An abstract class that defines a container for search attributes related to the Publication Date Preferred (BT-738) for notices and for planning notices to specify when the competition notice will be published (BT-127). Can be used to specify a start date, end date or a time range.

Element.Name: StartDate
Element.Description: Used to search upon the start date.

Element.Name: EndDate
Element.Description: Used to search upon the end date.

Element.Name: DeadlineReceiptTenders
Element.Description: An abstract class that defines a container for search attributes related to the deadline for tender reception (BT-131). Can be used to specify a start date, end date or a time range .

Element.Name: StartDate
Element.Description: Used to search upon the start date.

Element.Name: EndDate
Element.Description: Used to search upon the end date.

Element.Name: AdditionalInformationDeadline
Element.Description: An abstract class that defines a container for search attributes related to the the deadline to request for additional information (BT-13). Can be used to specify a start date, end date or a time range.

Element.Name: StartDate
Element.Description: Used to search upon the start date.

Element.Name: EndDate
Element.Description: Used to search upon the end date.

Element.Name: DeadlineReceiptRequests
Element.Description: An abstract class that defines a container for search attributes related to the deadline for reception of requests to participate (BT-1311). Can be used to specify a start date, end date or a time range.

Element.Name: StartDate
Element.Description: Used to search upon the start date.

Element.Name: EndDate
Element.Description: Used to search upon the end date.

Element.Name: NoticeIdentifier
Element.Description: Used to search for notice identifiers (BT-701) allowing to uniquely distinguishing notices amongst all other existing ones.

Element.Name: ProcedureIdentifier
Element.Description: Used to search for procedure identifiers (BT-04) allowing to uniquely distinguishing procurement procedures.

Element.Name: ProcedureLegalBasis
Element.Description: Used to search for legal references. The code indicates the EU Directive under which a notice is published.

Element.Name: ReservedParticipation
Element.Description: Used to search for notices that express a participation restriction (BT-71); e.g. only tenderers with specific social missions may tender.

Element.Name: SuitableForSMEs
Element.Description: Used to search for notices that indicate that a tender participation is suitability for SMEs (BT-726)

Element.Name: WinnerEconomicOperatorName
Element.Description: Used to search for the winning organisation name (BT-500) to whom a contract has been awarded.

Element.Name: AwardCriterionType
Element.Description: Used to search for the awarding criterion type code (BT-539) that is used to assess the tenders.

Element.Name: BuyerInformation
Element.Description: Used to search for the awarding criterion type code (BT-539) that is used to assess the tenders.

Element.Name: Name
Element.Description: Used to search for the contracting party organisation name (BT-500).

Element.Name: OrganisationNumber
Element.Description: Used to search for the contracting party organisation identifier (BT-501).

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: Used to search for the contracting party organisation identifier (BT-501).

Element.Name: PostCode
Element.Description: Used to search for the contracting party organisation post code (BT-512).

Element.Name: OrganizationCountrySubdivision
Element.Description: Used to search for the contracting party organisation country subdivision (BT-500) according to the Nomenclature of territorial units for statistics (NUTS).

Element.Name: CountryCode
Element.Description: Used to search for the contracting party country code (BT-514) according to country codes.

Element.Name: LegalType
Element.Description: Used to search for the contracting party type code (BT-11) according to legal type codes.

Element.Name: MainActivity
Element.Description: Used to search for the contracting activity type code (BT-610) of the buyer according to main activity codes.
